name: cutlet
content:
cutlet noun [C]
(PIECE OF MEAT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small piece of meat still joined to the bone, especially from the animal's neck or ribs: lamb cutlets
ALLEKO/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

cutlet noun [C]
(SAVOURY FOOD)
small pieces of vegetables, nuts, fish, or meat that have been pressed into a round flat shape: a nut cutlet

a small slice of meat, esp. from the ribs, that is usually fried: veal cutlets
